CreateCapacityProvider.name: CreateCapacityProvider
CreateCapacityProvider.description:
Creates a new capacity provider. Capacity providers are associated with an Amazon
                                                ECS cluster and are used in capacity provider strategies to facilitate cluster auto
                                                scaling.

CreateCluster.name: CreateCluster
CreateCluster.description: Creates a new Amazon ECS cluster.

CreateService.name: CreateService
CreateService.description: Runs and maintains a desired number of tasks from a specified task definition.

CreateTaskSet.name: CreateTaskSet
CreateTaskSet.description: Creates a new Amazon ECS task set.

DeleteAccountSetting.name: DeleteAccountSetting
DeleteAccountSetting.description:
Modifies the ARN and resource ID format of a resource for a specified IAM user, IAM
                                                role, or the root user for an account. You can specify whether the new ARN and resource
                                                ID format are disabled for new resources that are created.

DeleteAttributes.name: DeleteAttributes
DeleteAttributes.description: Deletes one or more custom attributes from an Amazon ECS resource.

DeleteService.name: DeleteService
DeleteService.description: Deletes a specified service within a cluster.

DeregisterContainerInstance.name: DeregisterContainerInstance
DeregisterContainerInstance.description: Deregisters an Amazon ECS container instance from the specified cluster.

DeregisterTaskDefinition.name: DeregisterTaskDefinition
DeregisterTaskDefinition.description: Deregisters the specified task definition by family and revision.

DescribeCapacityProviders.name: DescribeCapacityProviders
DescribeCapacityProviders.description: Describes one or more Amazon ECS capacity providers.

DescribeClusters.name: DescribeClusters
DescribeClusters.description: Describes one or more of your clusters.

DescribeServices.name: DescribeServices
DescribeServices.description: Describes the specified services running in your cluster.

DescribeTaskDefinition.name: DescribeTaskDefinition
DescribeTaskDefinition.description:
Describes a task definition. You can specify a family and revision to find information
                                                about a specific task definition, or you can simply specify the family to find the
                                                latest ACTIVE revision in that family.

DescribeTasks.name: DescribeTasks
DescribeTasks.description: Describes a specified task or tasks.

DiscoverPollEndpoint.name: DiscoverPollEndpoint
DiscoverPollEndpoint.description: Returns an endpoint for the Amazon ECS agent to poll for updates.

ListAccountSettings.name: ListAccountSettings
ListAccountSettings.description: Lists the account settings for an Amazon ECS resource for a specified principal.

ListAttributes.name: ListAttributes
ListAttributes.description: Lists the attributes for Amazon ECS resources within a specified target type and cluster.

ListClusters.name: ListClusters
ListClusters.description: Returns a list of existing clusters.

ListContainerInstances.name: ListContainerInstances
ListContainerInstances.description: Returns a list of container instances in a specified cluster.

ListServices.name: ListServices
ListServices.description: Lists the services that are running in a specified cluster.

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: List tags for the specified resource.

ListTaskDefinitionFamilies.name: ListTaskDefinitionFamilies
ListTaskDefinitionFamilies.description:
Returns a list of task definition families that are registered to your account (which
                                                may include task definition families that no longer have any ACTIVE task definitions).

ListTaskDefinitions.name: ListTaskDefinitions
ListTaskDefinitions.description: Returns a list of task definitions that are registered to your account.

ListTasks.name: ListTasks
ListTasks.description: Returns a list of tasks for a specified cluster.

Poll.name: Poll
Poll.description:
Grants permission to an agent to connect with the Amazon ECS service to report status
                                                and get commands.

PutAccountSetting.name: PutAccountSetting
PutAccountSetting.description:
Modifies the ARN and resource ID format of a resource for a specified IAM user, IAM
                                                role, or the root user for an account. You can specify whether the new ARN and resource
                                                ID format are enabled for new resources that are created. Enabling this setting is
                                                required to use new Amazon ECS features such as resource tagging.

PutAccountSettingDefault.name: PutAccountSettingDefault
PutAccountSettingDefault.description:
Modifies the ARN and resource ID format of a resource type for all IAM users on an
                                                account for which no individual account setting has been set. Enabling this setting
                                                is required to use new Amazon ECS features such as resource tagging.

PutAttributes.name: PutAttributes
PutAttributes.description: Create or update an attribute on an Amazon ECS resource.

PutClusterCapacityProviders.name: PutClusterCapacityProviders
PutClusterCapacityProviders.description:
Modifies the available capacity providers and the default capacity provider strategy
                                                for a cluster.

RegisterContainerInstance.name: RegisterContainerInstance
RegisterContainerInstance.description: Registers an EC2 instance into the specified cluster.

RegisterTaskDefinition.name: RegisterTaskDefinition
RegisterTaskDefinition.description: Registers a new task definition from the supplied family and containerDefinitions.

RunTask.name: RunTask
RunTask.description: Start a task using random placement and the default Amazon ECS scheduler.

StartTask.name: StartTask
StartTask.description:
Starts a new task from the specified task definition on the specified container instance
                                                or instances.

StartTelemetrySession.name: StartTelemetrySession
StartTelemetrySession.description: Grants permission to start a telemetry session.

SubmitAttachmentStateChanges.name: SubmitAttachmentStateChanges
SubmitAttachmentStateChanges.description: Sent to acknowledge that attachments changed states.

SubmitContainerStateChange.name: SubmitContainerStateChange
SubmitContainerStateChange.description: Sent to acknowledge that a container changed states.

SubmitTaskStateChange.name: SubmitTaskStateChange
SubmitTaskStateChange.description: Sent to acknowledge that a task changed states.

UpdateClusterSettings.name: UpdateClusterSettings
UpdateClusterSettings.description: Modifies the settings to use for a cluster.

UpdateContainerAgent.name: UpdateContainerAgent
UpdateContainerAgent.description: Updates the Amazon ECS container agent on a specified container instance.

UpdateContainerInstancesState.name: UpdateContainerInstancesState
UpdateContainerInstancesState.description: Enables the user to modify the status of an Amazon ECS container instance.

UpdateService.name: UpdateService
UpdateService.description: Modifies the parameters of a service.

UpdateServicePrimaryTaskSet.name: UpdateServicePrimaryTaskSet
UpdateServicePrimaryTaskSet.description: Modifies the primary task set used in a service.
